error.signature: WARNING: One or more build-args were not consumed

verdict.summary: Build arguments passed via --build-arg are not declared in the Dockerfile with ARG.

dead_ends.why_fails: The build arg isn't being used; the feature it should configure isn't applied

dead_ends.action: Setting build args as ENV instead
dead_ends.why_fails: ENV is baked into the image at runtime; different semantics from build-time ARG

workarounds.action: Add ARG <name> in the Dockerfile before the RUN command that uses it
workarounds.how: ARG must appear before the first usage in the Dockerfile

workarounds.action: For multi-stage builds, add ARG in each stage that needs it
workarounds.how: ARG is scoped to the build stage; must be redeclared after each FROM
